Best Practices AI-Opinion

System Architecture

// System Architecture: Staff Analytics Dashboard

Staff analytics dashboard utilizes pre-configured integration modules for standard
enterprise systems. Data extraction, normalization, and metric calculation are handled
automatically. The only manual input required isÂ setting role-specific performance
targets (KPIs/OKRs) and alert thresholds. All quantitative metrics are derived from
connected operational systems.

// Input Layer
Data Sources (API Integration)
â”œâ”€ HRMS API â†’ Employee records, tenure, positions
â”œâ”€ Payroll System â†’ Compensation, bonuses, equity
â”œâ”€ CRM â†’ Sales metrics, deals closed, revenue attribution
â”œâ”€ ERP â†’ Production output, operational metrics
â””â”€ Development Tools â†’ Git commits, Jira tickets, deployments

// Processing Layer
ETL Pipeline
â”œâ”€ Data extraction from multiple sources
â”œâ”€ Normalization & validation
â”œâ”€ Deduplication & conflict resolution
â””â”€ Time-series aggregation

Calculation Engine
â”œâ”€ KPI computation (revenue/employee, cost ratios)
â”œâ”€ Trend analysis (YoY, MoM comparisons)
â”œâ”€ Benchmarking against targets
â””â”€ Risk scoring

// Configuration Layer
Manual Inputs
â”œâ”€ Role-specific KPI definitions
â”œâ”€ Target thresholds per metric
â”œâ”€ Alert rules & escalation policies
â””â”€ Weight coefficients for composite scores

// Output Layer
Staff Dashboard
â”œâ”€ Executive summary cards
â”œâ”€ Department-level breakdown
â”œâ”€ Individual performance tables
â””â”€ Interactive drill-down views

Alert System
â”œâ”€ Real-time anomaly detection
â”œâ”€ Threshold breach notifications
â”œâ”€ Multi-channel delivery (Email, Slack, SMS)
â””â”€ Escalation workflows

// Alert Triggers
âš ï¸ Turnover rate > 15%
âš ï¸ Payroll cost > 70% of revenue
âš ï¸ Key personnel tenure < 6 months
âš ï¸ Productivity drop > 20% MoM
âš ï¸ Understaffing in critical roles
